keywords.value: Now Is the Time. Now Is the Best Time. Now Is the Best Time of Your Life (Play)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: An oddly endearing production at the Abrons Arts Center that traffics far more in scary bearded creatures than narrative intelligibility.

headline.print_headline: Where Rip Van Winkle Meets Creepy Gnomes
headline.main: Review: Rip Van Winkle Meets Creepy Gnomes in ‘Now Is the Time. Now Is the Best Time. Now Is the Best Time of Your Life.’

snippet: An oddly endearing production at the Abrons Arts Center that traffics far more in scary bearded creatures than narrative intelligibility....
abstract: Elisabeth Vincentelli reviews Little Lord theater company production of play Now Is the Time. Now Is the Best Time. Now Is the Best Time of Your Life. written and directed by Michael Levinton with Laura von Holt, at Abrons Arts Center.
